headline: PNC to Acquire FirstBank in $4.1B Deal, Expand in Colorado & Arizona
summary: PNC Financial agrees to acquire FirstBank in a $4.1B deal, aiming to boost scale and expand in Colorado and Arizona.

headline: PNC agrees to acquire FirstBank in $4.1bn deal
summary: The acquisition will involve approximately 13.9 million shares of PNC common stock and $1.2bn in cash.
